envFileX.envFile.string.description: Path to the environment variable file (string)
envFileX.envFile.string.markdownDescript: Specify a single .env file path. Supports VSCode variables like ${workspaceFolder}.
envFileX.envFile.array.description: Paths to multiple environment variable files (array)
envFileX.envFile.array.markdownDescripti: Specify multiple .env file paths as an array. Later files override earlier ones. Supports VSCode variables.
envFileX.envFileX.markdownDescription: Flexible environment variable injection supporting multiple files, command output, placeholders, and more.
envFileX.command.markdownDescription: Shell command or script path to output environment variables. Supports inline script or file path, and VSCode variables.
